channel.title: Blog on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Rusland 1

item.title: Little Russia (Zemfira Amsterdam)
item.description: When I dare to speak some words in Russian, it is immediately noticed. Hear that, over there, a Dutchman! Once inside, it becomes even clearer. Perhaps because the coats are now stored, in a safe that causes four times heavy traffic in the corridors.

item.title: OPERATION WAR
item.description: Speech Putin gave a speech (see also here and here) and, one assumes, believed in a quick victory. It turned into a disaster for everyone, and over two years later, the likelihood of terrible escalation seems more realistic than that of a quick end.
